Blockquotes

Blockquotes can have transparent or shaded backgrounds.

Before they sold out pickled bicycle rights pabst. Biodiesel slow-carb cardigan ugh swag pop-up. Hella ethical etsy bushwick tofu forage. Hoodie cray cred, master cleanse squid brunch marfa polaroid man bun. Keytar forage synth mlkshk neutra. Sustainable gastropub pork belly, single-origin coffee 8-bit freegan cornhole wolf kale chips ennui direct trade fap franzen lomo. Kitsch tacos tote bag ramps, normcore before they sold out try-hard.
Before they sold out pickled bicycle rights pabst. Biodiesel slow-carb cardigan ugh swag pop-up. Hella ethical etsy bushwick tofu forage. Hoodie cray cred, master cleanse squid brunch marfa polaroid man bun. Keytar forage synth mlkshk neutra. Sustainable gastropub pork belly, single-origin coffee 8-bit freegan cornhole wolf kale chips ennui direct trade fap franzen lomo. Kitsch tacos tote bag ramps, normcore before they sold out try-hard.
<blockquote>Before they sold out pickled bicycle rights pabst. Biodiesel slow-carb cardigan ugh swag pop-up. Hella ethical etsy bushwick tofu forage. Hoodie cray cred, master cleanse squid brunch marfa polaroid man bun. Keytar forage synth mlkshk neutra. Sustainable gastropub pork belly, single-origin coffee 8-bit freegan cornhole wolf kale chips ennui direct trade fap franzen lomo. Kitsch tacos tote bag ramps, normcore before they sold out try-hard.</blockquote>

<blockquote class="shaded">Before they sold out pickled bicycle rights pabst. Biodiesel slow-carb cardigan ugh swag pop-up. Hella ethical etsy bushwick tofu forage. Hoodie cray cred, master cleanse squid brunch marfa polaroid man bun. Keytar forage synth mlkshk neutra. Sustainable gastropub pork belly, single-origin coffee 8-bit freegan cornhole wolf kale chips ennui direct trade fap franzen lomo. Kitsch tacos tote bag ramps, normcore before they sold out try-hard.</blockquote>

Blockquotes can also be assigned a color scheme.

This is a primary blockquote.
This is a shaded primary blockquote.
This is a success blockquote.
This is a shaded success blockquote.
This is an error blockquote.
This is a shaded error blockquote.
This is a warning blockquote.
This is a shaded warning blockquote.
This is an information blockquote.
This is a shaded information blockquote.
<blockquote class="primary">This is a primary blockquote.</blockquote>
<blockquote class="primary shaded">This is a shaded primary blockquote.</blockquote>

<blockquote class="success">This is a success blockquote.</blockquote>
<blockquote class="success shaded">This is a shaded success blockquote.</blockquote>

<blockquote class="error">This is an error blockquote.</blockquote>
<blockquote class="error shaded">This is a shaded error blockquote.</blockquote>

<blockquote class="warning">This is a warning blockquote.</blockquote>
<blockquote class="warning shaded">This is a shaded warning blockquote.</blockquote>

<blockquote class="info">This is an information blockquote.</blockquote>
<blockquote class="info shaded">This is a shaded information blockquote.</blockquote>

Colors

Many elements in the Barista Framework can be assigned a color scheme. The preferred method of specifying a color scheme is by purpose.

default
A gray color scheme, applied to all color-themed elements by default

primary
A blue color scheme for identifying important actions and elements

success
A green color scheme for reporting successful actions and events

error
A red color scheme for reporting fatal errors or warning of destructive actions. This color scheme can also be referenced as danger

warning
A yellow color scheme for reporting non-fatal errors or unexpected results

info
A cyan color scheme for reporting relevant information 

<p class="txt">
	<code>default</code><br>
	A gray color scheme, applied to all color-themed elements by default
</p>

<p class="txt primary">
	<code>primary</code><br>
	A blue color scheme for identifying important actions and elements
</p>

<p class="txt success">
	<code>primary</code><br>
	A green color scheme for reporting successful actions and events
</p>

<p class="txt error">
	<code>primary</code><br>
	A red color scheme for reporting fatal errors or warning of destructive actions.
	<em>This color scheme can also be referenced as</em> <code>danger</code>
</p>

<p class="txt warning">
	<code>primary</code><br>
	A yellow color scheme for reporting non-fatal errors or unexpected results
</p>

<p class="txt info">
	<code>primary</code><br>
	A cyan color scheme for reporting relevant information
</p>

Color schemes can also be referenced by color names. For brevity, these colors will not be demonstrated elsewhere in these documents but any element which can be assigned a color scheme by purpose can also be assigned a color scheme by name.

red
green
blue
cyan
magenta
yellow
purple
orange

<div class="lbl red">red</div>
<div class="lbl green">green</div>
<div class="lbl blue">blue</div>
<div class="lbl cyan">cyan</div>
<div class="lbl magenta">magenta</div>
<div class="lbl yellow">yellow</div>
<div class="lbl purple">purple</div>
<div class="lbl orange">orange</div>

Cards

Cards are generic containers with a header and footer.

Card

Before they sold out pickled bicycle rights pabst. Biodiesel slow-carb cardigan ugh swag pop-up. Hella ethical etsy bushwick tofu forage. Hoodie cray cred, master cleanse squid brunch marfa polaroid man bun. Keytar forage synth mlkshk neutra. Sustainable gastropub pork belly, single-origin coffee 8-bit freegan cornhole wolf kale chips ennui direct trade fap franzen lomo. Kitsch tacos tote bag ramps, normcore before they sold out try-hard.

Footer
<div class="card">
	<header>Card</header>
	<p>Before they sold out pickled bicycle rights pabst. Biodiesel slow-carb cardigan ugh swag pop-up. Hella ethical etsy bushwick tofu forage. Hoodie cray cred, master cleanse squid brunch marfa polaroid man bun. Keytar forage synth mlkshk neutra. Sustainable gastropub pork belly, single-origin coffee 8-bit freegan cornhole wolf kale chips ennui direct trade fap franzen lomo. Kitsch tacos tote bag ramps, normcore before they sold out try-hard.</p>
	<footer>Footer</footer>
</div>

Cards can also be assigned a color scheme.

Primary

Footer

<div class="card primary">
	<header>Primary</header>
	Content
	<footer>Footer</footer>
</div>

<div class="card success">
	<header>Success</header>
	Content
	<footer>Footer</footer>
</div>

<div class="card error">
	<header>Error</header>
	Content
	<footer>Footer</footer>
</div>

<div class="card warning">
	<header>Warning</header>
	Content
	<footer>Footer</footer>
</div>

<div class="card info">
	<header>Information</header>
	Content
	<footer>Footer</footer>
</div>

Alerts

Alerts are a simplified variant of cards for content that does not need a header or footer.

This is a default alert.
<div class="card alert">This is a default alert.</div>

Alerts can also be assigned a color scheme.

Primary message
Success message
Error message
Warning message
Information message
<div class="card alert primary">Primary message</div>
<div class="card alert success">Success message</div>
<div class="card alert error">Error message</div>
<div class="card alert warning">Warning message</div>
<div class="card alert info">Information message</div>

Modal Cards

Cards can be displayed as modal views by adding the modal class to the card and using a link or button to target the card. 

<div class="card modal" id="modal-default">
	<header>Default Modal Card</header>
	<p>This is the default style for modal cards.</p>
	<a class="ok">Dismiss<a>
	<footer>Default card footer</footer>
</div>

<button data-action="modal" data-target="#modal-default">Default</button>

Overlay

By default, the dimmed overlay will appear behind the modal card. This can be disabled using the data-overlay="false" attribute on the targetting link or button. 

<button data-action="modal" data-target="#modal-default" data-overlay="false">No Overlay</button>

By default, clicking outside the card will dismiss the modal. This can be disabled using the data-overlay="static" attribute on the targetting link or button. 

<button data-action="modal" data-target="#modal-default" data-overlay="static">Static Overlay</button>

Duration

By default, the modal card will remain visible until it is dismissed. A modal can be automatically dismissed after a specified delay using the data-duration attribute on the targetting link or button. The duration is specified in milliseconds. 

<button data-action="modal" data-target="#modal-default" data-duration="1300">Auto-dismiss</button>

Action Buttons

Modal cards can trigger actions using buttons in the card footer. Adding the btns class to the card footer will evenly distribute any buttons it contains. Buttons with a class of ok or cancel will trigger an event of the same names on the card. 

<div class="card modal warning" id="modal-warning">
	<header>Warning Modal Card</header>
	<p>Are you sure you want to do this thing?</p>
	<footer class="btns">
		<button class="cancel">Cancel</button>
		<button class="ok">Do it!</button>
	</footer>
</div>

<button data-action="modal" data-target="#modal-warning">Dialog</button>

<script type="text/javascript">
	$('#modal-warning').on('ok', function() {
		setTimeout(function() {
			$('#modal-success').modal({ overlay: false, duration: 1300 });
		}, 700);
	});
</script>
Default Modal Card

This is the default style for modal cards.

Dismiss
Default card footer
Warning Modal Card
Are you sure you want to do this thing?
You were successful!
